# cells-avatar-item

Displays an icon and up to 3 different info values next to it.

Example:
```html
<cells-avatar-item
  main="main"
  secondary="secondary"
  info="info"
  avatar="assets/avatar.png">
</cells-avatar-item>
```

```

## Styling

The following custom properties and mixins are available for styling:

| Custom property                          | Description       | Default        |
|:-----------------------------------------|:------------------|:--------------:|
| --cells-avatar-item-scope                | scope description | default value  |
| --cells-avatar-item                      | empty mixin       | {}             |
| --cells-avatar-picture                   | empty mixin       | {}             |
| --cells-avatar-item-list                 | empty mixin       | {}             |
| --cells-avatar-item-list-title           | empty mixin       | {}             |
| --cells-avatar-item-list-secondary       | empty mixin       | {}             |
| --cells-avatar-item-list-secondary-extra | empty mixin       | {}             |
| --cells-avatar-item-list-info            | empty mixin       | {}             |
